page.title: 17A Scunthorpe Health Centre
page.content:
{ Ashby Health Centre, Scunthorpe,}was established twenty-one years ago. It has one{doctor,}one{dentist}and two {health visitors,}all of whom are full-time. There are also various part-timers, for example,{dental {nurses, physiotherapists,}a{dietician and some clerks. The premises also house two{General Practitioners.
They all felt that the clinic is used to full capacity and that it could do with more facilities and specialists, especially{health visitors}and{child {care assistants.}The clinic is administered by{Scunthorpe General {Hospital.
